duration_raw: until the next time you make your daily preparations
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">[Hallucinatory Terrain](/Spells.aspx?ID=145)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 343 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>

<row>10 minutes ([material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284))</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 500 feet

**Area** 50-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the next time you make your daily preparations
</row>

</column>

---

You create an illusion that causes natural terrain to look, sound, feel, and smell like a different kind of terrain. This doesn't disguise any structures or creatures in the area.

 Any creature that touches the illusion or uses the Seek action to examine it can attempt to disbelieve your illusion.

---
**Heightened (5th)** Your image can also disguise structures or create illusory structures (but still doesn't disguise creatures).
name: Hallucinatory Terrain
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 343 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">

</row>

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 500 feet

**Area** 50-foot burst

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
 

**Duration** until the next time you make your daily preparations
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
A natural environment appears to be another kind of terrain.
</summary>
summary: A natural environment appears to be another kind of terrain.
summary_markdown: A natural environment appears to be another kind of terrain.
text: Hallucinatory Terrain Source Core Rulebook pg. 343 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult, Primal Cast 10 minutes (material, somatic, verbal) Range 500 feet Area 50-foot burst Duration until the next time you make your daily preparations --- You create an illusion that causes natural terrain to look, sound, feel, and smell like a different kind of terrain. This doesn't disguise any structures or creatures in the area. Any creature that touches the illusion or uses the Seek action to examine it can attempt to disbelieve your illusion. --- Heightened (5th) Your image can also disguise structures or create illusory structures (but still doesn't disguise creatures).
